description: This is an entry point JavaScript file for a React-based frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, some CSS styling, and the main App component. It initializes the React app by rendering the App component into the DOM element with the id 'root' inside a React.StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a new React root container for rendering a React component tree.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the provided React elements into the root container.
